title: A Rose by any other name
description: Rose was born in country Sussex on Feb 28th 1916. She can't remember her mother as she died when Rose was born and her Gran is the only person she has in this world ... or so she has been told. But what secret does her Gran share on her deathbed? This well written book introduces a realistic character into your life and you will find yourself travelling with Rose and sharing her tears, her joy, her triumphs and her fears when she suddenly finds herself completely alone in a frightening world and searching for someone she can call family. Here are some comments from MARIA "Thank you so much for sharing that beautiful, amazing book with us all." CLARE NEWITT " I couldn't put it down!!! Cheryl, it was BRILLIANT!!!! I'm unbelievably impressed, what an amazing hidden talent!" DORNE "Awesome book, only took me 1 day to read (which is a miracle for me!) Couldn't put it down!"
author: Cheryl A. Barnes
